description: Ask questions, get answers and meet new people with Wakie. Socialize when bored, express feelings through voice calls. Wakie, the social anonymous app for phone calls, is great for this. Now, you can create any topic you want to discuss and get matched with someone who would make a good conversation partner. That person could be anyone in the world, as long as you speak a common language! Try talking to someone online. Not by posts and photos published on your social media, but with messages. Meet other people on the internet by messaging them in chat apps and free chats or try facetime random people or text strangers in random chat app or random chats. Mainly facetime strangers dont like long conversations so that facetime random people will be interesting. Be careful using free random chats or anon chats. Texting strangers and sending them photos is fun, but its crucial to follow the safety rules. Its a way better than a social media app. Its a safe social call application where you make new friends with free chat people in your country or all around the world. Due to the privacy policy, Wakie is a secure talk to talk app that makes you feel safe, so speak freely to a stranger. Another advantage of this secure app that is usually turned to waike or walkie, is that it makes your life more eventful by chatting and talking freely 24/7 .  Wakie is a perfect solution as a social app for everyone who wants to be heard. Youll find your match quickly, in a few seconds. Just register and start talking to others. Wakie (or waike or walkie  common mistakes made by users) can be used as a calling app.  Wakie combines the best of social chat, anonymous chat, or calling apps. This social app allows you to converse with a stranger and have fun. Meet new people and build connections with Wakie  download and register now!
